unittitle_ssm: Records of the King Juan Carlos I of Spain Center
abstract_ssm: The King Juan Carlos I of Spain Center promotes research and teaching on Spain and the Spanish-speaking world at New York University. The Records of the King Juan Carlos I of Spain Center contains a 2011 publication, Centelles in_edit_¡oh!, related to a photography exhibition of Spanish journalist Agustí Centelles Ossó. This exhibition was jointly sponsored by the Spanish Ministry of Culture and the King Juan Carlos I of Spain Center at NYU.
